attributes.title: If I could give zero stars I would!
attributes.review:
This app is horrible! I downloaded it onto my phone to support my favorite president because I knew he was feeling down about all of the gen z kids torching him on tiktok about his ğŸ¤ 
But the second I opened the app it was just a bunch of pictures of his eenie teeny weenie! Completely unprofessional in my opinion, especially when I think so low of him already!
But wait, it gets worse! I didnâ€™t want to see anymore of his inverted sausage, so I tried to delete the app off of my phone, but when I tried to do so, it downloaded ALL of the pictures onto my phone! I was furious! This app needs to be taken down, I donâ€™t want anybody else to go through the trauma that I was put through. The only positive thing I have to say is that trumps ding dong is MUCH smaller than mine, and thatâ€™s really saying something, seeing as Iâ€™m a woman. Real confidence booster.

attributes.title: ouch
attributes.review: I went out for a walk cause it was so beautiful out and thought of downloading this app. As soon as it opened a picture of a ğŸŠ popped up. Scared the living cooties out of me. I even screamed as I usually do when I get frightened however the craziest thing happened. While going for my walk I ran into some people holding flags in their front yard. The flags said â€œğŸŠ 2020â€ i believe. They were just sitting in some yard chairs fyi. Silly lazy gooses. Any who I went up to them at first saying â€œgood eveningâ€ and proceeded to tell them about how bad this app is. They got so mad. I donâ€™t know why? They got so mad that they stood up, took there flags, and impaled me. The family had enough so they went back inside their house leaving me in the front yard, with this dumb app open. Last thing I saw on the app was that it was telling me I had to pay $45 to continue. Moral of the story is iâ€™m paralyzed now. Stupid app.

attributes.title: Would give it a lower score
attributes.review: My name is Yoshikage Kira. Iâ€™m 33 years old. My house is in the northeast section of Morioh, where all the villas are, and Iâ€™m not married. I worked as an employee for the Kame Yu department stores, and I get home everyday at 8pm at the latest. I donâ€™t smoke, but I occasionally drink. Iâ€™m in bed by 11pm, and and make sure I get 8 hours of sleep, no matter what. After a glass of warm milk and doing stretches out of bed, I usually have no problems sleeping till morning. Just like a baby, I wake up with out any fatigue or stress in the morning. I was told there was no issues with my last checkup. Iâ€™m trying to explain that Iâ€™m a person who wishes to live a quiet life. I take care not to trouble my enemies, like winning or losing, that would cause me to lose sleep at night. That is how I deal with society, and I know it brings me happiness. Although if I were to fight I wouldnâ€™t lose to anyone.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE. DO NOT BUY!
attributes.review: When first opening this app it asked me where my ancestors are from, which I thought was a bit off, but I eventually entered Germany. Immediately after I entered Germany, a large group of white, blonde hair, blue eyed, scary men banged on my front door and burst into my house yelling German at me. I was distraught and afraid for my life. They may have mentioned the word Aryan but not quite sure what that means?? I told them to leave my house immediately but they wouldnâ€™t and eventually made me eat their toenails when I threatened to call the policeğŸ· on them! They even killed my pet hamster Churro. RIP baby Churro youâ€™ll never be forgottenğŸ˜ğŸ’€. I will not allow Churroâ€™s death to go unnoticed and am writing this review so you can protect yourselves! Despite deleting the app I keep getting messages from Trumpâ€™sğŸ¤¡ campaign asking me if Iâ€™m sexually attracted to cheetosğŸŸ ? This is definitely NOT what I signed up for. ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE!ğŸ˜¤
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to feel proud to be an American and to make America great again but once installing this app, it took me at least 6 hours to get it download with trial and error. When the app finally downloaded it had crash my entire phone. I couldnâ€™t access anything such as my tik tok nor instagram and i noticed that my screen would flash orange from time to time. It got so awful that I had to factory reset my phone. But after factory resetting, these glitches remained the same and the only thing i could hear is the â€œStar Spangled Bannerâ€ by Fergy. I decided to throw away my iphone because of this. I am now in debt due to the fact that I had to buy another iphone because samsungs are not aesthetically pleasing to my eyes. Therefore, this is a TRASH app. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT UNLESS YOU WANNA KILL YOUR PHONE. Anyways Chile, who wants something from Chipotle, while i walk my fridge???

attributes.title: Just no ğŸ’•
attributes.userName: Oh no, not the cheeto puff âœ¨ğŸ’•
attributes.review: I was very excited to install the app of my beloved Cheeto, but unfortunately the app took 3 days to install and during this time I was unable to use any of the other apps on my phone. Not only that, but the app began to give my phone screen an annoying orange tint as it downloaded. Once it finished installing, it drained my phone down to 10% within 15 minutes. Exactly 1 hour after downloaded it, 5 men dressed in orange suits and Donald Trump masks arrived at my house, demanded my family to let them in and when we refused, they shot down the front door. They began to release cockroaches and took my pet turtle, trying to make it choke on a plastic straw while simultaneously boiling it alive. The orange men in suits then took us out of our house and burned it down. Due to these unfortunate events caused by this app, I am forced to uninstall it and give a 1 star review. No hate to my disgusting orange Cheeto puff. â˜ºï¸ğŸ’âœ¨

attributes.title: do not download
attributes.review: wanted to get this app to try and educate myself because based off of other sources I read, the president doesnâ€™t seem like someone to support. it baffles me that people do. Despite that I still wanted to see why people supported him that didnâ€™t have to do with the economy. To my surprise, I download the app and all of a sudden my phone starts glitching. It stopped charging, music started playing every time i opened my phone, I canâ€™t text, and I always miss calls because my phone no longer shows me when people call. The keyboard glitches too. As we speak I am barely able to type these words out. Itâ€™s a lot of lagging and back tracking to get it correctly. Basically do not download this app. Itâ€™ll make your phone glitch and it didnâ€™t even provide me with what I thought it would. Not educational. Seems to promote hate more than anything :(

attributes.title: bad app and bad president

He doesnâ€™t respect women and thinks of them as if their objects. He called the coronavirus the Kung-flu. Trump also referred to black lives matter protesters fighting for basic civil rights for black people as â€œthugsâ€, and white armed people protesting to decry the stay at home order and to be able to get a haircut and do other very unnecessary things during a literal global pandemic as â€œgood peopleâ€. And you can look it up, heâ€™s done lots more of horrible things.
